title: L.I.E
lyrics: i bam-e daeche eodi yeonlaghae cham aneun yeoja dongsaengdeul manhne GO (GO) A WAY (A WAY) nae chinguga neol gil-eseo bwassdae nega naege jandago han geu ttae GO (GO) A WAY (geojinmal an hae eh) hon ja bang an-eseo hancham ulgo issneun de bamsae pulliji anhneun gi bun ttaemun-e geuji gat-a na eot teoghae eotteoghae dojeohi deo neun cham-eul su eobsneunde BABY I Know I Know I Know ne geojis mal ije nega sum swineun geosdo silh-eo seuchineun geosjocha nan silh-eo BABY I Know I Know neol saeng-gaghalsu log deo naleul deo michige mandeuneun neoui LIE LIE LIE LIE EH EH LIE LIE LIE LIE EH EH
